resources.string: Click on the glass of water after you\'ve had a glass. \n\nWe will remind you when you\'re on WiFi and when your device is charging to drink more!
Once you\'ve connected to WiFi, we\'ll issue reminders to drink water through notifications. We\'ll keep track of how many of those reminders we\'ve issued here.
Once you\'ve begun charging your device, we\'ll issue reminders to drink water through notifications. We\'ll keep track of how many of those reminders we\'ve issued here.
We\'ll display the number of glasses of water you\'ve had here.
There\'s never a better time to drink water than when you know your phone is charging. Drink up!
You\'re connected. Wonderful. Let\'s take a sip!
Times are hard when there isn\'t any WiFi. Let\'s reflect on how fortunate you are right now to have WiFi by taking a sip of that high quality H20
